directions: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions; cook and stir until tender. Place the green beans into a large pot with about 1 inch of water. Bring to a boil, and cook for 5 minutes.

Add the cabbage to the pot, and top with the cooked onion. Season with sweetener and salt, then top with bratwurst. Dot with remaining butter. Cook uncovered over low heat for 30 minutes. Stir, and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh bratwurst, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 pound green beans, trimmed and cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 teaspoon granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda)
title: Oklahoma Comfort Food: Brats, Cabbage and Green Bean Casserole
